Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Tivoli Lisboa, you'll be centrally located in Lisbon, steps from Cinemateca Portuguesa Museum and Medeiros e Almeida Museum. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Botanical Garden and National Museum of Natural History.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 306 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and espresso makers. Your Select Comfort bed comes with down comforters. LCD televisions with cable programming are provided for your entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour business center, and limo/town car service. Planning an event in Lisbon? This hotel has 13993 square feet (1300 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.
    • Special cancellation policies or charges may apply for group reservations (more than 8 rooms for the same hotel / stay dates).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Cinemateca Portuguesa Museum - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Medeiros e Almeida Museum - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Botanical Garden - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
National Museum of Natural History - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Marques de Pombal Square - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Torel Garden - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Principe Real Square - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Jose Tomas de Sousa Martins Monument - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Edward VII Park - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Ascensor da Gloria - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Miradouro de Sao Pedro de Alcantara - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Belvedere Sao Pedro de Alcantara - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Foz Palace - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Cardaes Convent - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Restauradores Square - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

The preferred airport for Tivoli Lisboa is Lisbon (LIS-Portela) - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hotel Tivoli Lisboa is Lisbon (LIS-Portela) - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi.

Room 1
Check in time: 3pmCheck out time: 12pm
Notice
From 01st January 2019, the City tax of Lisbon becomes 2€ per overnight stay and per person, up to a maximum total value of 14€ (Seven straight nights per overnight stay/person). Please note that the municipal fee it's NOT included in the room rate and it has to be paid by the guest at the check-out. Kids under 13 years are exempted.

Room 1
From 2019-03-12 To 2030-12-31
City Tax
A city tax of EUR 2 per person per night is not included in the total price for hotels in Lisbon and should be paid on site. This tax is charged to guests aged 13 and older. It is subject to a maximum of 7 Nights.

Room 1
From 2019-03-12 To 2030-12-31
City Tax
A city tax of EUR 2 per person per night is not included in the total price for hotels in Lisbon and should be paid on site. This tax is charged to guests aged 13 and older. It is subject to a maximum of 7 Nights.

Room 1
City Tax: Lisbon hotels charge a nominal daily City Tourist Tax directly to the customer. Local regulations state this must be collected by the hotel and cannot be prepaid. Please don’t hesitate to contact our call-centre if you require further information.

Important Information: Drinks are not included for half board.

Important Information: Early Departure: Total Stay will charge / No-show: 1 night will charge.
